amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to finalize, issue, implement, or enforce the proposed policy of the EPA entitled National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System Permit Requirements for Municipal Wastewater Treatment During Wet Weather Conditions dated November 3, 2003.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that no funds in the bill may be used to finalize, issue, implement, or enforce the proposed policy of the EPA entitled "National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System Permit Requirements for Municipal Wastewater Treatment During Wet Weather Conditions" dated Nov. 3, 2003.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
